name: Bones (Samuelsm)
description:
1.  Commands:
    1. Move Left:  A
    2.  Move Right:  D
    3. Jump: W/Space
    4. Reset Level: O
    5. Go to Level Menu: P
  2. Team:
    1. Programmer: Samuel Martins
    2. Music: Arthur
    3. Character and Items: Marina Silva
  3. Downloaded Assets:
